name: Pluripotency
description: Though the parasite crisis on this side of the galaxy has been addressed, Species 8472 still seems poised to attack, to say nothing of the possibility of future infestations from fluidic space. Return peace to the galaxy once more.
rules:
-- Unique Hirogen, Maquis and Section 31 Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Data, Icheb, Barclay, Infected Tryla Scott, or Astrophysicists will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Data, Icheb, Barclay, Infected Tryla Scott, or Astrophysicists
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Brunt
featured_crew.flavor: Liquidator Brunt of the Ferengi Commerce Authority is often called in to handle any suspect behavior from Quark and his family.

featured_crew.name: Icheb
featured_crew.flavor: Icheb takes a stand against Seven’s methods of assimilating the recovered Borg children into civilian life.

rewards.name: Hirogen Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Hirogen faction missions.

rewards.name: Maquis Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Maquis faction missions.

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Hirogen faction missions.

rewards.name: Maquis Transmission

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.flavor: Liquidator Brunt of the Ferengi Commerce Authority is often called in to handle any suspect behavior from Quark and his family.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Brunt
rewards.flavor: Liquidator Brunt of the Ferengi Commerce Authority is often called in to handle any suspect behavior from Quark and his family.

goals.flavor: Hunt any escaped parasites with the Hirogen.

potential_rewards.name: Hirogen Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Hirogen faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Mitigate any future disasters with the Maquis.

screens.text: "Like any pest problem, those parasites left a big mess in their wake. Trust in Starfleet higher-ups was dwindling to begin with, then to add mind-controlling parasites to the mix..."
"How about the fact that Species 8472 still hasn't backed down? The Federation won't have to worry about its parasite PR problem if we've all been destroyed!"

"Indeed, Species 8472 poses our most immediate threat. But it would seem pertinent to learn more about fluidic space as well. Those parasites and Species 8472 may not be our only cause for concern stemming from that dimension."
"You're both right. Well, Captain, we could definitely use all hands on deck right now. Think you can help us clean up this mess?"
"Like any pest problem, those parasites left a big mess in their wake. Trust in Starfleet higher-ups was dwindling to begin with, then to add mind-controlling parasites to the mix..."
"How about the fact that Species 8472 still hasn't backed down? The Federation won't have to worry about its parasite PR problem if we've all been destroyed!"

"Indeed, Species 8472 poses our most immediate threat. But it would seem pertinent to learn more about fluidic space as well. Those parasites and Species 8472 may not be our only cause for concern stemming from that dimension."
"You're both right. Well, Captain, we could definitely use all hands on deck right now. Think you can help us clean up this mess?"
